document_data.name: Igan
document_data.mainbody: '''Igan''' was a squire who fought for [[Damara]] in {{yearlinkName|1373}}.{{cite book/The Rite||Prologue}}
document_data.Description: Igan was a gangly youth, with a face scarred by pox.
document_data.Personality: Igan idolized King [[Gareth Dragonsbane]]. He was also very curious and eager to fight for the King.
document_data.Possessions: His horse was a spotted, male destrier called Rain.
document_data.History:
He was in the King's company fighting near [[Ostrav]] on [[Mirtul 3]]. While there, he discovered the treachery of [[Sergor Marsk]], but later was put out of the fight by a ''[[telekinesis]]'' spell from a ''[[fang dragon]]'' whil trying to protect the King.{{cite book/The Rite||12}}

Igan was slain by an arrow while rescuing Queen [[Christine Dragonsbane]] in the fight against the Vaasan horde of [[Flamerule 11]].
